mapper.insert: insert into account(account_number, create_date, purpose, income_source, balance, prime_rate) values(#{accountNumber},to_date(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD'),#{purpose},#{incomeSource},#{balance},#{primeRate})
mapper.delete: delete from account where account_id =(select account_id from users where user_id=#{value})
